TransactionStateContext.DepositState: Users can send Ether to the contract, stored in contract balance.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When GetPie or withdraw functions are called, funds are transferred from the contract balance.

ExternalInteractions.Description: The contract allows users to send Ether, increasing the contract's balance.
Owner can transfer the contract balance to an arbitrary address or withdraw it entirely.
The Owner can execute arbitrary calls with the Command function, sending Ether or interacting with other contracts.
